bibl.title: Letter from A.F.A. King to Howard A. Kelly, October 21, 1907

div1.p: King responds to questions regarding publications of the Philosophical Society. He makes reference to a Smithsonian Institution report.

div1.head: Letter from A.F.A. King to Howard A. Kelly, October 21, 1907

opener.dateline:
1315 Mass. Ave., Washington D C
Oct 21 07

div1.p:
In reply to your kind note
of Oct 18: In those days the Philosophical
society published nothing but the leaf of the
bulletin -- a reprint of which I put in the
Popular Science Monthly for you. Did you
not find it there?-

I send you today a reprint of an
address by Prof. Ordronaux (still living in
Roslyn N.Y.) which may interest you.

I have always intended to look
Ac
In to L
up his reference to the Smithsonian
Institution Report, but thus far
have neglected to do so.
